skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has a 40% chance of stealing 1 random buff from the target.

Attacks all enemies 3 times. Each hit has a 50% chance of placing one of the following debuffs for 2 turns: a [Block Buffs] debuff, a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff, a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff, a 25% [Weaken] debuff, a 50% [Decrease ACC] debuff, or a 100% [Heal Reduction] debuff.

Decreases each enemy’s ACC by 10 for each debuff they are under. This Champion will receive 4% less damage for each debuff on the attacker. Heals this Champion by 1,250 HP each time a debuff expires on
books: an enemy. Has a 75% chance of placing a Provoke debuff for 1 turn on enemies under 5 or more debuffs at the start of this Champion’s turn. This Champion can place debuffs on weak hits.

skills.description: Increases Ally ACC in all Battles by 60.
